name: stuffing
content:
stuffing noun [U]
(MATERIAL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
material that is pushed inside something to make it firm: This seat is losing its stuffing.

stuffing noun [U]
(FOOD)
a mixture of food, such as bread, onions, and herbs, that is used to fill something that is going to be eaten, such as a chicken or a vegetable, before being cooked: a stuffing for the turkey sage and onion stuffing

Idioms
beat/kick/knock the stuffing out of someone
knock/take the stuffing out of someone/something
Add to word list
Add to word list
material that is used to fill something: The stuffing was coming out of the mattress.
Stuffing is also food, usually a mixture of bread, onions, and herbs, which is used as a filling for turkey or other meats or vegetables.
